Title: Object of Desire
Plot: Sandra's old flame DCI Larson, head of the Met's arts and antiques squad, asks the team to reinvestigate the murder of antiques dealer Mal Baxter. His death was originally thought to be the result of a burglary gone wrong, but new evidence suggests Baxter was a police informant while conducting underhanded deals.
ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.
